properties.name: toggly.global.enabledByDefault
properties.description: Determines the default behavior of the feature in case its status is missing

properties.name: toggly.global.missingTogglesBackToDefault
properties.description: Whether features declared in a TogglyEnum but not configured in the Toggly controller should use the default status

properties.name: toggly.scrapper.rate
properties.description: Determines the frequency toggly client queries toggly controller to retrieve the status of the features. Expressed in ms
